c74object.name: abc_2d_encoder~
c74object.description:
abc_2d_encoder~ is a 2D Ambisonic (HOA) encoder.
abc_encoder1~, abc_encoder2~, etc. objects enable to create punctual sources either in rotation at a certain speed or static and located at a precise angle (in degrees) on the ambisonic circle - speed is the rotation speed in turns by second - angle is the default static angle (in degrees) when the speed is zero - returntime is the transition time (in msec) between the fixed angle position and the position on the circle when the speed is more than 0

method.name: angle
method.description: set the angle of the encoded signal in degree[init=0:min=-360:max=360:step=0.01].
method.digest: set the angle of the encoded signal in degree

method.name: speed
method.description: set the rotation speed of the encoded signal in turn/s [init=0:min=-100:max=100:step=0.001].
method.digest: set the angle of the encoded signal in degree

method.name: returntime
method.description: set the return time in ms of the encoded source to come back to intial position after rotation speed goes back to 0 [init=20:min=0:max=1000:step=1].
method.digest: set the angle of the encoded signal in degree
